Notes.Text:
This update for openvswitch fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-35498: Fixed a denial of service related to the handling of Ethernet padding (bsc#1181742).

Vulnerabilities.Description: A vulnerability was found in openvswitch. A limitation in the implementation of userspace packet parsing can allow a malicious user to send a specially crafted packet causing the resulting megaflow in the kernel to be too wide, potentially causing a denial of service. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.
